text:
*ML Security Senior Engineer, 50-130k USD, SF/Berlin/Helsinki/remote*

<https://www.imachines.com/>

We are looking for uniquely talented applicants with a strong track record and expert level skills at the intersection of AI/Machine Learning, scalable software, and Cybersecurity.

Responsibilities

In this role you will work on critical production infrastructure that supports security features of our customer facing products. You will be able to adapt and architect solutions that fit with our existing codebases, as well as design novel techniques using the latest Deep Learning techniques to support these features. Moreover, you will need to work on dynamically evolving systems, threat models, and customer requirements.

Requirements

Knowledge of FS Python and JS
Specialization in Pytorch/TF
Experience with generative models, sequence-to-sequence approaches (RNNs, Transformers), automatic code generation, anomaly detection, and large scale distributed GPU or TPU based training
Familiarity with production environments, CI/CD, devops tools, Kubernetes, test-driven development, writing reliable, well documented code
A self-motived, driven and inquisitive mindset is essential for this role; showcasing example projects in the security/ML space will also be beneficial. Experience at other startups or companies in the security & ML industries is valuable. Published academic work (journals, conference papers, MSc/PhD theses) in the field may also be taken into account

you can write me here, tg: ufi00 or <mailto:p@occurai.com|p@occurai.com>

attachments.title: Intuition Machines, Inc. (California)
attachments.text: Intuition Machines, Inc. specializes in deep learning and visual domain machine learning at scale.
